message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 300k, that's a good start for you!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a good deal!
You can have 200k, but I think I deserve more for my skills!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but don't expect me to be generous forever!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking the majority!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm going soft!
You're getting low, I'm taking the lion's share now!
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm keeping the majority!
You're almost out of options, I'm taking what's left!
I'll give you a token amount, but I'm keeping the majority!
I'll take 99.999%, you can have the rest!
